# Vaibhav Kothari - Portfolio

> Full-stack web developer specializing in React, TypeScript, and modern web technologies. Showcasing projects in web development, machine learning, and open-source contributions.

## Featured Projects
- [Portfolio Website](https://vaibhavkothari.vercel.app/): Personal portfolio featuring full-stack projects and technical work.
- [GitHub Projects](https://github.com/vaibhavkothari33/): Collection of open-source projects and code repositories.
- [LeetCode Profile](https://leetcode.com/u/vaibhavkothari33/): Competitive programming solutions and algorithm practice.

## About & Skills
